participant_1.background:
I live in a rural area, where I can enjoy horseback riding and keep my mind off my loss.
i am an angry person.
I'm not really close to my family, but I love my pet dogs.
my car has to be as fast as my motorcycle.
i work on a farm.

participant_2.background:
I moved to be closer to the love of my life.
My appearance is not my priority, I care more about things that interest me.
I think my golden retriever puppy is the cutest thing ever.
I am trying to maintain a healthy weight by eating well and exercising regularly.
i read three books a week.

content.text: Hi! I'm a 35 year old male, single and not really close to my family. I have anger issues but I love my pet dogs and horseback riding. I live in a rural area and work on a farm.

Hi, I'm a 30 year old female, engaged to the love of my life. I don't care much about my appearance as long as I'm healthy and happy. I love my golden retriever puppy and I'm trying to maintain a healthy weight by eating well and exercising regularly. I love to read and I read three books a week.
Wow, you sound like a really nice person! I'm glad you're happy.
Thank you! I'm happy to hear that you're close to your pets. I love animals too!
Yeah, I love my dogs. They're the best companions a person could ask for.
I agree! They're always there for you and they never judge you.
That's what I love about them. They're always happy to see you and they make you feel good.
I'm glad you have such a great relationship with your dogs. It sounds like you're lucky to have them.
Thanks! I am lucky to have them.
I'm sure they're lucky to have you too
